dish_name: the classic steak and kidney pie
ingredients: tablespoon   beef drippings or 1   tablespoon    cooking oil
lbs    chuck steaks, cut into 1 inch dice
lb    ox kidney (or lamb's, trimmed and diced)
pint    veal stock (or water and stock cube or granules) or 1   pint    beef stock (or water and stock cube or granules)
